title: Game crashed in post game
body: How do I report someone if my client crashed after game. This player was extremely toxic saying things such as "suck my whole (bleep) this **** is all for you" "You ****ing   - - -got". This kind of behavior should not be tolerated and needs to be punished. I have the time the game was played, and his summoner name.

replies.body:
Ooof, I'm sorry to hear your client crashed before you could report them. :(

You can report them via a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our game specialists, and we appreciate you doing so. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
